helpgrid.innerhtml: Enter a comment for extending the date. Click OK when finished.

dialog.label: Create Inherited Master PMs for Fleets
Create Associated PMs for CM Items

helpgrid.innerhtml: Select the check box for each row containing the asset that needs PMs created for them. To create associated PMs, click OK.
Select the check box for each row containing the asset or location that needs PMs created for them. To update associated PMs, click OK.
Displays summary of action hierarchy. Note that it is possible that actions displayed here may not have been created using 'Create Associated Actions' yet.
Select the checkbox for each row containing the asset or location that needs PMs created for them. To create associated PMs, click OK.
Enter a description for the revised Master PM. Click OK when finished.
